question: Which country has raised objections to the inclusion of Kalapani in new political map of India?
explanation: Nepal has objected to the inclusion of Kalapani within Indian Territory in the new political map of the country. Its under administration of Pithoragarh of Uttarakhand but claimed by Nepal as part of its Darchula District.  Kalapani is controlled by India\'s Indo-Tibetan Border Police since the 1962 border war with China.
